publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4953 Dr Jean Turner: International Week Against Pain - 16 to 22 October 2006â€”That the Parliament congratulates all organisations supporting people who live with constant chronic pain conditions; welcomes the various worldwide events taking place during International Week Against Pain; agrees that pain relief is a human right, as identified by the World Health Organisation, and calls on the Scottish Executive to ensure that the recommendations of the McEwen report are implemented across Scotland without further delay. Supported by: Campbell Martin*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Tommy Sheridan*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-4953 International Week Against Pain - 16 to 22 October 2006 (lodged on 13 October 2006) Christine Grahame*, John Swinburne*, Shiona Baird*, Shona Robison*, Eleanor Scott*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-4953 International Week Against Pain - 16 to 22 October 2006 (lodged on 13 October 2006) Frances Curran*
S2M-4953 International Week Against Pain - 16 to 22 October 2006 (lodged on 13 October 2006) Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-4953 International Week Against Pain - 16 to 22 October 2006 (lodged on 13 October 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-4953 International Week Against Pain - 16 to 22 October 2006 (lodged on 13 October 2006) Rosie Kane*
